ygData.subject: Re: Where is the jewelry in Freeport, or is there one?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe there is a blue house in North Freeport that sells all kinds of mundane jewelry.  Its unmarked and right next to, maybe even attached to, a
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> I know the place that sells silver,gold, etc bars. I know all the merchants
> in the spellcaster's guild that sell some jewels.
> Isnt there are real jewelry in Freeport? In Erudin, you can find all sorts
> of stones at the jewelry, not only the spell components. But the trip is
> kinda long to get a few jewels...
> Thanks,
> Skara the Enchantress

I believe there is a blue house in North Freeport that sells all kinds of
mundane jewelry. Its unmarked and right next to, maybe even attached to, a
simple two story house that is empty. Its not too far from the Free Market.
I hope that helps...

--
Destine "Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult
Bret Guillet to drive; easy to govern but impossible to enslave."
